items.title: Procter & Gamble: 69 Years of Dividend Growth Fueled by Rising Cash Flow
items.description: The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) is one of the best dividend stocks for a bear market. The company is a dividend powerhouse, having delivered consistent payouts for decades, driven by its reliable cash flow, which also supports future dividend growth. In fiscal Q3 2025, The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) generated $3.7 billion in [â€¦]
